name: helix-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an omanyte.
short_effect: Can be revived into an Omanyte.

flavor_text.emerald: A piece of an ancient marine POKéMON’s seashell.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be part of a seashell.
